roleset.name: create incentives for, motivate

role.descr: impelled agent, incentives provided to whom?
incentivized action, arg1 now has incentives to do what?

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Let business pay for more of our transportation bill, which they will pass to us, of course, and incentivize them to locate where they put the least stress on the system.
example.arg: to locate where they put the least stress on the system.

roleset.note: INCENTIVIZE-V NOTES: Created by Claire (from incentivize.01-v)
